column4: one question... I had a little problem. used gparted to move my old windows partition but I have damaged the mbr... is there any tool to fix the mbr of windows? Im unable to find the damn windows cd, you never know where it is when you need it..
What specifically is damaged? If the MBR is bad, you wouldn't be able to boot anything... there is no "windows mbr".
I wanted to run something like fixmbr or fdisk /mbr
What is broken? What would that command do?
